character.name: action
character.label: action
character.description: Action is the Field you find yourself in when you're fighting, run-ning, or you have to take the situation into your own hands.

character.name: guts
character.label: guts
character.description: Guts is the Field you find yourself in when you need to keep calm or concentrated while reacting quickly to stressful or dangerous situations.

character.name: knowledge
character.label: knowledge
character.description: Knowledge is the Field you find yourself in when you must rely on your studies and technical or theoretical notions you acquired.

character.name: society
character.label: society
character.description: Society is the Field you find yourself in when you deal with other people,  domesticated  animals  and  man-made  environments  (both  modern  and ancient).

character.name: wild
character.label: wild
character.description: Wild  is  the  Field  you  find  yourself  in  when  you're  interacting  with  natural or harsh environments and wild animals, when you need to tap into your primordial brain.

character.name: crime
character.label: crime
character.description: Crime is the Field you find yourself in when you're acting secretly or try to avoid hidden dangers and ambushes.

character.name: fight
character.label: fight
character.description: Fighting (with or without weapons) enemies in close combat. Escaping a grapple.

character.name: leadership
character.label: leadership
character.description: Inspiring or leading others. Commanding or giving orders that leave no room for doubt.

character.name: stunt
character.label: stunt
character.description: Doing stunts. Moving in dangerous or acrobatic situations. Jumping off a runaway train. Running through a volley of bullets.

character.name: cool
character.label: cool
character.description: Keeping your cool in the face of danger. Not reacting to a shocking scene. Acting with lucidity at the right time.

character.name: drive
character.label: drive
character.description: Driving or piloting any kind of vehicle when you are doing dangerous maneuvers or trying to outrun or reach somebody.

character.name: shoot
character.label: shoot
character.description: The ability to shoot a firearm, use bow and arrow or any other ranged weapon.

character.name: culture
character.label: culture
character.description: General knowledge on a vast array of topics. Academic education. Comprehension of local uses and customs.

character.name: first-aid
character.label: first-aid
character.description: Treating wounds and diagnosing illnesses. Allows you to remove certain Bad Feelings.

character.name: tech
character.label: tech
character.description: Using, constructing or repairing mechanical, IT or electronic devices.

character.name: charm
character.label: charm
character.description: Appearing attractive or elegant. Making a good impression. Seducing or charming others.

character.name: eloquence
character.label: eloquence
character.description: Discussion, persuasion, deception and negotiation. Seeming lik-able and trustworthy to others.

character.name: observation
character.label: observation
character.description: Spotting someone or something. Noticing hidden  details. Sense other people's emotions and lies.

character.name: scout
character.label: scout
character.description: Traveling through wild places. Climbing and trekking.  Swimming and diving. Finding your bearings in the wild.

character.name: survival
character.label: survival
character.description: Surviving in harsh environments with no equipment. Hunting and tracking. Building a camp to create a Safe Place.

character.name: tough
character.label: tough
character.description: Endurance to adverse conditions and pain. Lifting, pushing or mov-ing heavy objects. Showing off physical resistance and raw strength.

character.name: alert
character.label: alert
character.description: Spotting dangers. Avoiding pursuit and not falling for traps. Noticing details that can lead to unexpected events.

character.name: dexterity
character.label: dexterity
character.description: Accomplishing tasks that require exact and nimble hands. Lifting purses and picking locks. Doing sleight of hand tricks.

character.name: stealth
character.label: stealth
character.description: Hiding or moving quietly. Treading softly and with extreme preci-sion. Following somebody or avoiding pursuit.

compendium.name: old
compendium.label: Old
compendium.description: You're old. You get the 4-th expertise.

compendium.name: young
compendium.label: Young
compendium.description: You've just started living the path of an adventurer. You don't get the '3rd expertise. Though you get a 'Young' Good Feeling that is refreshed every Episode

compendium.name: experienced
compendium.label: Experienced
compendium.description: You're a regular adventurer. Go with regular rules

compendium.name: height
compendium.label: Height
compendium.description: Running on rooftops, jumping across chasms and into the void

compendium.name: orienteering
compendium.label: Orienteering
compendium.description: Finding and keeping your bearings using environmental clues, a compass, or a map

compendium.name: archeology
compendium.label: Archeology
compendium.description: Establishing the age of an object or site, deciphering ancient languages, knowing the past

compendium.name: degree
compendium.label: Degree
compendium.description: Practice and theory of your studies
